timeline.message:
Add JanusGraphServer and JanusGraphSettings

Partial fixes #2119

* Add custom JanusGraph header on startup
* Print JanusGraph version on startup
* Auto configure serializers for gremlin

Signed-off-by: Jan Jansen <jan.jansen@gdata.de>

timeline.author: FlorianHockmann

+import com.jcabi.manifests.Manifests;
+import org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.GremlinServer;
+import org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.Settings;

timeline.bodyText: Was this a TODO or what is its purpose?
timeline.author: FlorianHockmann

timeline.bodyText:
The read(final String file) is just an overload of read(final InputStream stream) but it has a different behaviour as it also performs autoImport (if preventAutoConfiguration is not set)
I think that's confusing and would prefer if both overloads would have the same behavior except for the fact that one takes a String while the other takes a Stream. So read(final InputStream stream) should already call autoImport in my opinion.
timeline.author: FlorianHockmann

timeline.bodyText: from a file This method isn't taking a file but a Stream.
timeline.author: FlorianHockmann
FlorianHockmann

timeline.bodyText: (nitpick) How about moving this copying from one settings to another into a dedicated method for that to not clutter this method?
timeline.author: FlorianHockmann

timeline.bodyText: Is there really no other way to use an existing config file and something to it than to copy every element explicitly? This means that we have to change this every time something changes in the GremlinServer settings :/
timeline.author: FlorianHockmann

timeline.message:
Add JanusGraphServer and Default serializers

Partial fixes #2119

* Add custom JanusGraph header on startup
* Print JanusGraph version on startup
* Default set of TinkerPop serializers

Signed-off-by: Jan Jansen <jan.jansen@gdata.de>

Some review comment resolvings

Signed-off-by: Jan Jansen <jan.jansen@gdata.de>
